text: aur (us vakt qo yaad karo) jab hamane tumhen (tumhaare burzago ko) phiraun (ke panje) se chhudaaya jo tumhen bade-bade dukh de ke sataate the tumhaare ladakon par chhuree pherate the aur tumhaaree auraton ko (apanee khidamat ke lie) zinda rahane dete the aur usamen tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraph se (tumhaare sabr kee) sakht aazamaish thee
